title: Exquisite Mango Mala Haaram with Emerald Pendants
materials: Emerald Green Cabochons. Featuring a signature Hyderabadi Polish for enduring luster.
features: A classic Mango Mala design, meticulously crafted with intricate filigree work and studded with sparkling CZ stones. Features two detachable pendants, each centered with a vibrant emerald green cabochon. The mango motifs, or 'paisley' as they are sometimes called, are set in a unique closed setting to maximize brilliance. Traditional 'Lakshmi Kasu' detailing can be added upon request for an additional charge to enhance its auspiciousness.
colors: Dominantly gold with dazzling white CZ stones
accented by the rich green of the emeralds. This combination is revered as auspicious in South Indian traditions.
occasions: and other grand celebrations. Its timeless design also makes it a treasured heirloom for future generations.
description: This Haaram is a testament to superior craftsmanship and classic South Indian design. The combination of 22K gold, brilliant CZ stones, and genuine emeralds creates a breathtaking effect. The unique closed stone setting enhances the sparkle of the CZ's. It embodies traditional values and adds a touch of regal elegance to any ensemble.
